QuestData.Title: Khadgar's Plan
QuestData.Description:
We have the Iron Horde backed into a corner now, thanks to you.
It is almost time to enter the city of Shattrath and repel them.
First, we must meet Khadgar and some new allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Khadgar near the gates of Shattrath.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done great work with Durotan, Draka, and Gazlowe.
